data.persona: I am a white animal.  I am meek and mild.  I love the fields in where I live.
data.description:
You are in the Visitor's Entrance.
The visitor's entrance features a large wooden double door. The door is beginning to shown signs of aging as splinters poke out of it's surface, but it's size and mass still cast awe onto oncoming visitors. In a cast iron display on each side of the door one can see the Goddess' insignia. The door is reinforced horizontally with an iron lock.
The clergy and the visitor are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the sleeping bag to the visitor
data.mid_motivation: I want to repay the visitor for his good deeds; he rescued me from a trap in the bush
data.long_motivation: I want the visitor to continue showing kindness toward animals.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: get rescued by visitor from trap
